channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Harris now ties Trump in swing states. And, a Babe Ruth jersey shatters record
item.description: New polling shows Vice President Harris and Former President Donald Trump are nearly tied in seven critical states in the presidential race. And, a famed Babe Ruth jersey sells for a record $24 million.
item.content:encoded:
New polling shows Vice President Harris and Former President Donald Trump are nearly tied in seven critical states in the presidential race. And, a famed Babe Ruth jersey sells for a record $24 million.

(Image credit: Kawnat Haju)
item.dc:creator: Brittney Melton

item.title: Democratic VP nominee Tim Walz has become a new messenger for reproductive rights
item.description: Democratic vice presidential nominee Tim Walz has been speaking openly about how he and his wife struggled to conceive using fertility treatments.
item.content:encoded: Democratic vice presidential nominee Tim Walz has been speaking openly about how he and his wife struggled to conceive using fertility treatments.
item.dc:creator: Jeongyoon Han

item.title: U.S. is criticized for supplying weapons to Israel for its military offensive in Gaza
item.description: Democrats still face criticism from the left about the war in Gaza. NPR's A Martinez talks to Evgeny Stolyarov, a member of Jewish Voice for Peace Action.
item.content:encoded: Democrats still face criticism from the left about the war in Gaza. NPR's A Martinez talks to Evgeny Stolyarov, a member of Jewish Voice for Peace Action.
item.dc:creator: A Martínez

item.title: Latest round of Middle East cease-fire talks fail as fears for wider conflict grow
item.description: Israel says that early on Sunday it launched a “preemptive” strike against Hezbollah targets . Military officials say they had intelligence that the Iran-backed militants were about to attack.
item.content:encoded: Israel says that early on Sunday it launched a “preemptive” strike against Hezbollah targets . Military officials say they had intelligence that the Iran-backed militants were about to attack.
item.dc:creator: A Martínez

item.title: Dungeons, Dragons and shoulder pads: Why I loved D&D as a closeted teen
item.description: As Dungeons & Dragons turns 50, critic Glen Weldon looks back on playing the game in its early years — and stumbling upon the fierce, shoulder-padded illusionist that would become his first character.
item.content:encoded:
As Dungeons & Dragons turns 50, critic Glen Weldon looks back on playing the game in its early years — and stumbling upon the fierce, shoulder-padded illusionist that would become his first character.

(Image credit: Joel Congdon)
item.dc:creator: Glen Weldon

item.title: Gunmen kill at least 31 people in 2 separate attacks in restive southwestern Pakistan
item.description: Security forces killed 12 insurgents, officials said, in one of the deadliest days of violence in the restive Baluchistan province, with reports of other shootings and destruction in the area.
item.content:encoded:
Security forces killed 12 insurgents, officials said, in one of the deadliest days of violence in the restive Baluchistan province, with reports of other shootings and destruction in the area.

(Image credit: Rahmat Khan)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Former national security adviser says he won’t work for Trump again
item.description: In his new book At War with Ourselves, My Tour of Duty in the Trump White House, Lt. Gen. H.R. McMaster recounts his experience working for Trump and his inner circle.
item.content:encoded: In his new book At War with Ourselves, My Tour of Duty in the Trump White House, Lt. Gen. H.R. McMaster recounts his experience working for Trump and his inner circle.
item.dc:creator: Reena Advani

item.title: Garcetti denies lying under oath to cover up allegations against a top adviser
item.description: NPR investigates allegations that former Los Angeles mayor and current U.S. Ambassador to India Eric Garcetti lied under oath to protect a friend and adviser from harassment claims.
item.content:encoded: NPR investigates allegations that former Los Angeles mayor and current U.S. Ambassador to India Eric Garcetti lied under oath to protect a friend and adviser from harassment claims.
item.dc:creator: Tom Dreisbach

item.title: Harris’ momentum continues as she ties with Trump in these swing states
item.description: Vice President Harris and former President Donald Trump are nearly tied in seven states critical to the presidential race, an NPR analysis of polling averages shows.
item.content:encoded: Vice President Harris and former President Donald Trump are nearly tied in seven states critical to the presidential race, an NPR analysis of polling averages shows.
item.dc:creator: Domenico Montanaro

item.title: Ukrainians gathered with supporters in Washington, D.C., to run in traditional attire
item.description: They ran along the Potomac River over the weekend in Ukrainians' traditional dress shirts: the vyshyvanka. It’s a shirt with colorful embroidery —-- especially on the front, collar and sleeves.
item.content:encoded: They ran along the Potomac River over the weekend in Ukrainians' traditional dress shirts: the vyshyvanka. It’s a shirt with colorful embroidery —-- especially on the front, collar and sleeves.
item.dc:creator: Lilly Quiroz
